{"step_by_step_thinking": "Autophagy is a cellular process in which cells recycle their own components to obtain nutrients. It is a mechanism used by cells to maintain homeostasis and survive under conditions of nutrient deprivation. However, autophagy is not a process by which a virus obtains nutrients from its host.
